Parameters:
b - the buffer into which the data is read.
Throws:

readFully

public static final void readFully(java.io.InputStream i,
                                   byte[] b,
                                   int off,
                                   int len)
                            throws java.io.IOException
The read fully method from data input stream is very useful for all types of streams...

Parameters:
b - the buffer into which the data is read.
off - the start offset of the data.
len - the number of bytes to read.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - the stream has been closed and the contained input stream does not support reading after close, or another I/O error occurs.
